tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Researcher ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE GeneticData ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_id INT, data BLOB, FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researcher(id) );

CREATE TABLE patient_information (patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name STRING,
  last_name STRING,
  age INT,
  gender STRING,
  ethnicity STRING,
  has_family_history BOOL);

CREATE TABLE genetic_data (data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  data_type STRING,
  data_value FLOAT,
  data_unit STRING,
  test_date TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_patient_id FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_information (patient_id));

CREATE TABLE research_results (result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
  result_summary STRING,
  CONSTRAINT fk_patient_id FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_information (patient_id));

CREATE TABLE Researchers (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    specialization VARCHAR(255),
    affiliation VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR(255),
    sample_type VARCHAR(255),
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Genes (
    gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    analysis_type VARCHAR(255),
    gene_function VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Mutations (
    mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mutation_type VARCHAR(255),
    gene_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Genes(gene_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Experiments (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
    experiment_date DATE,
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
)
